name: Andrélon Classic conditioner perfecte krul
composition: Ingredients: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Arganolie), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein (Tarweproteïne), Parfum, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Disodium EDTA, PEG-7 Propylheptyl Ether, Cetrimonium Chloride, Paraffinum Liquidum, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.
